Manages IT staffing business operations. Leads recruiting efforts, account management and consultant management for large corporate clients. Builds and maintains strong Client relationships to gain in-depth understanding of  technology requirements.  Provides Strategic Sourcing of the highest caliber technical professionals for permanent and contract requirements.  Email address: Dawn@adeptsource.com
Recruited IT professionals for Fortune 50 Clients.

Co-established the AJILON Phoenix District office in 1988. Consistently performed in the top 10% of revenue producing Technical Recruiters nationwide.  Supported the Western Region as a Senior Regional Recruiting Manager for 16 years. Was instrumental in the effort to become ISO 2000 Certified in Phoenix. Earned President’s Club distinction several consecutive years.

Dawn is an integral part of our organizations operations and delivery.  She is always filled with enthusiasm for providing the best candidates and consultants for our clients.  Her meticulous methodology of managing our recruiting process is world-class.  Dawn is a team player all the way.  She always delivers exactly what our client’s ask for and can always be trusted.  She is a “first class” human being and her success is eminent in this business because of her consistency, quality and outstanding work ethics.  In addition, she is a great listener and liaison between client’s and candidates and is very creative in structuring win-win scenarios and solutions.  Dawn often “saves the day” when we have had urgent situations arise that seemed impossible and has always been successful in providing viable and exceptional solutions.  Dawn’s attention to detail combined with her rapid ability to work with her team to deliver the resources required, create a recruiting professional “powerhouse” as Dawn truly is.  She is second to none in this industry and we are blessed to have her working with our organization.

summary: A Senior IT Staffing Executive responsible for running day to day operations of a dynamic IT staffing company.  Over 28 years' experience in Software Consulting and IT Staffing in Recruiting, Account Management, Training, and Operations Management. Provides executive leadership to the sales and recruiting teams, manages multiple large corporate accounts, and works closely with IT executives to achieve IT staffing objectives. Dawn's strengths and expertise lie in her understanding of technology and her ability find the right skill sets.  She builds strong professional relationships, and consistently focuses on quality recruitment and management practices.Specialties include providing corporate clients with high level, hard-to-find IT candidates, such as CIOs, IT Directors/Managers, program and project managers, business analysts, system architects, database administrators, ERP & eCommerce implementation specialists, network and cyber security specialists, data warehouse / business intelligence specialists, and software developers.
name: Dawn West
